body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Reservations       Fees Admission to the site is free.  This includes entrance to the memorial and to the visitor center, and to all ranger-led programs.   Permits  Commercial filming and photography as well as other special uses, when appropriate, may be approved through a permit. Fees and cost-recovery may apply. Please see Permits & Reservations for more information.  Â        2015 Annual Pass.   America the Beautiful: The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass Series   For more information about passes available from the National Park Service and other federal agencies, please see: www.nps.gov/findapark/passes.htm.   No pass is needed at the General Grant National Memorial.
title: General Grant National Memorial: Fees & Passes
